branchCategory.name: Rotary
branchCategory.description: <p>Rotary electric actuators feature a rotating worktable positioned above an enclosure for the motor and drivetrain. Three different motor/table sizes are available, with each size offering a basic and high &nbsp;torque variation. Additionally, each size offers four rotating angle options, including 90&deg;, 180&deg;, 310 / 320&deg;, and continuously rotating.</p>

branchItem.name: Rotary Table
branchItem.description: The LER rotary electric actuator series features a rotating worktable positioned above an enclosure for the motor and drive train. Three different motor/table sizes for this rotary electric actuator are available, with each size offering a basic and high torque variation. Additionally, each size offers four rotating angle options, including 90°, 180°, 310 / 320°, and continuously rotating.
